replies.body:
Ok let see here...what were the most votes from last sale..Mmmm..only 3 votes for 3 different champs..guess I have to pick one. Let see. 

Ok..time to start. *ahem*


{{champion:53}} **Blitzcrank Files #2. First date for Jarvan IV did not go so well. Files state that he also like his date to be a bit mysterious. Recommend Akali**


{{champion:59}} sigh..been here for half an hour and she is still not here.

{{champion:84}} Actually I have been here the whole time.

{{champion:59}} AHHH!!! *falls out of chair*

{{champion:84}} Sorry...I tend to do that. 

{{champion:59}} Why?

{{champion:84}} I like to be mysterious like that.

{{champion:59}} And exactly how often do you do this?

{{champion:84}} Quite a lot actually. In fact I am standing behind you as we speak.

{{champion:59}} No you are not-**SWEET CHRIST HOW DID YOU DO THAT!!!?**

{{champion:84}} Do what? This? 

{{champion:59}} Akali? Where did you go? Hello? .......I want to go home. 


*Later at Home*

{{champion:59}} oh god, oh god, oh god.

{{champion:102}} Jarvan?

{{champion:59}} AHHH!! Oh..it just you. Sorry. That Akali girl has me spooked. She can be anywhere. She can behind the curtains, under that chair, she can be under the bed sheets waiting for me. I'm scared out of my mind.

{{champion:102}} Poor Jarvan. Want a hug?

{{champion:59}} A hug would be nice. Wait..she never asked for hugs before. 

{{champion:102}} .....

{{champion:59}} .....

{{champion:102}} .....{{champion:84}} Hi.

{{champion:59}} AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

{{champion:84}} "Wanna have a party?"
{{champion:59}} {{champion:102}} O.o
{{champion:98}} "Hey guys."
{{champion:59}} "Where did you come-"
**ZAPP**
{{champion:85}} "I made it guys."
{{champion:59}} "You just burnt through my bed!"
{{champion:79}} "Hey, I heard there was a party."
{{champion:59}} "This is a disaster..."
...
{{champion:238}} "The unseen party is the deadliest..."
{{champion:84}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:85}} "Shut up, Zed!"
{{champion:238}} >.<
{{champion:16}} "I brought a fruit salad!"

{{champion:96}} "mmm, time to feast."
{{champion:74}} "The Disco Ball's gone MAD!"
{{champion:61}} "That's MY disco ball!"
{{champion:30}} "Time for some Karaoke!"
**BOOM**
{{champion:96}} D:
**SECOND KABOOM**
{{champion:30}} "ouch"

{{champion:412}} "guys don't tell Luc about this. He just moans about Kalis.. err I mean his wife."
{{champion:32}}" How come I wasn't invited."
Guys I'm still here{{champion:84}}
{{champion:59}} AHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
{{champion:62}} :9 Mmmmm you {{summoner:2}} my mind like a banana.
{{champion:64}} surprise party??
{{champion:161}} Eye helped him
Wait, how did you see that one coming?
you forgot fiddlesticks...
{{champion:9}} SURPRISE BIATCH
Oh you
:D you know you luv it. <3
every Monday and Thursday I wake up, the first thing I do is come look at your stories they make me smile, thank you for your time and effort you put into these.  To LightDragoon88
Awwwww....that so sweet.
yea, I guess I am a sweet guy.  8D PS. also I vote for {{champion:60}} or {{champion:222}}   pls

Glad you like it.

Same

Have j4 go out with orianna but she ends up with blitz xD
i'm confused, was is it{{champion:84}} never asking for hugs or {{champion:102}} ?

{{champion:102}} 

Now this could mean she never hugs him or that she hugs him all the time without asking him. Now which one is it? I'll let you pick.

D:

i'm going to choose her hugging him without asking, or probably...

man i'm imagining dirty things {{champion:59}} would do to {{champion:102}} 

{{champion:59}}  on top of {{champion:102}}  omg, kyaaaaaaa....
Good choice sir.
I love reading these, I main akali too :)
{{champion:122}} nice job but I have to kill you XD

{{champion:61}} MUST. NOT. MAKE. PORTAL JOKE.
{{champion:98}} Dual wielding sticks like a boss.
{{champion:39}} Her skins are the only cool thing about her.
{{champion:112}} Fullmetal Alchemist overkill.

{{champion:75}} Who's a good puppy? You are! Yes you are!
idk why they banned poppy from the free week wheel :(
She is kinda OP, but the main reason she never goes on free week is because she has no clear counter

Viktor has improved a lot with his rework. He has many styles you can build for him now and can work in a lot of team comps. 


But if you haven't played him before, skip the sale and wait for a free week rotation. If you like him then, then get him with IP.
Good guy lightdragon88: Saving your rp for the things that really matter to you.

Yeah...like {{champion:72}} new skin. 

:D
He's easy and likable. His play style can be hard to understand but the way it is is fun so I'd say like lightdragoon88, just wait for a new free rotation
And look at who on rotation tomorrow. :D

I have this theory that the home screen with {{champion:14}} , is him getting revenge on jarvans dad or grandfather (cant remember witch one sorry help me out).
however the reason why I think this is the home screen has {{champion:14}}  standing over a body with his (the bodies) hand up and you are looking at {{champion:14}}  through a first person perspective as that someone who {{champion:14}}  appears is about to strike down...
also the shape of the helmet is the same shape as jarvans. 
also isn't {{champion:14}}  trying to get revenge? (please correct me if im wrong)

its sad it took me until today to notice but what helped is the fact that if you move the mouse around the screen the vision of the person shifts every direction and you can see his hand trembling. 

also excuse me if someone else already stated this ♥

Except Sion killed the king that killed him before dying.
That king's broken crown is now Sion's jaw.
